Edward Joseph Cleary (18 April 1913 – 6 April 1985) was an Australian cricketer. He played three first-class cricket matches for Victoria during the 1933â€“34 season. The son of politician Edward Cleary, he played locally in the Benalla and District Cricket Association as well as for South Melbourne and VCA Colts in Melbourne district cricket.
